On Nov 19, 2007 2:33 PM, Alex Ruiz <alruiz15@...> wrote:

> Unfortunately, I'm stuck with JUnit 4.3.1.

Because you're required, or prefer, not to use the latest version as a
library?  (Not to belabor the point, but it's worth knowing how long
it takes features to make their way from the published version onto
people's desktops, and why.)

Thanks again for your ideas on the other extensibility concerns--I'll
look forward to your review of how some of them are handled in JUnit
4.5.  :-)

   David
